word:
Teachers, if you will open your hearts to the indwelling of the Spirit of God, if you will welcome the heavenly guest, God will make you laborers together with Him. In cooperation with the Master Teacher, the spirit of selfishness will be expelled, and wonderful transformations will take place.--Ms 69, 1908, p. 3. ("Teacher, Know Thyself," June 19, 1908.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. October 27, 1982
